summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from June 22, 2020, discussing scheduling a meeting to receive an update on the Ghislaine Maxwell case from the SDNY (Southern District of New York). The email suggests coordination between FBI personnel and possibly the ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge) regarding the latest developments.

events.title: Email coordination for Maxwell case update
events.description: Internal FBI email exchange to schedule a meeting for an update on the Ghislaine Maxwell case from the SDNY.

keyFacts: The email is dated June 22, 2020, and is internal FBI correspondence.
The subject matter is an update on the Ghislaine Maxwell case, indicating active investigation and coordination with the SDNY.
The email proposes a meeting time of 2:30 PM the following day (June 23, 2020) with the ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge) to hear the latest developments.
